{{velocity}} #* * Main webhome * ----------- * * This sheet presents all the spaces that a user can access. This includes his own personal space and all of the spaces linked to the group he is in. * * Author: Jean SIMARD (jean.simard@xwiki.com) *# ############################################## ## GLOBALS ############################################## ## GLOBAL VARIABLES #set($userId = $xcontext.getUser().replace('xwiki:', '').replace('XWiki.', '')) #set($user = $services.eesc.getUser($userId)) #set($groupsForUser = $services.eesc.getGroupsForUser($userId))
############################################## ## CONTROLLER ############################################## #controller() #macro(controller) #if(!$groupsForUser.isEmpty()) #displayMenu() #else #displayErrorNoGroup() #end #end
############################################## ## VIEW ############################################## #* * Display the navigation menu * ----- * * Display all subwikis links (which go through the CSRedirect redirection page) and applications (like task manager) in a 'menu' element. *# #macro(displayMenu) {{menu type="vertical collapsible"}} * [[image:icon:house Accueil>>xwiki:Main.WebHome]] * ---- #set($queryString = 'is_user=true') #set($userName = $user.getName()) * [[image:icon:user Espace de ${escapetool.xml($userName)}>>xwiki:EESCCode.CSRedirect||queryString="$queryString"]] #set($userWikiName = 'u' + $user.getId()) #if($services.wiki.exists($userWikiName)) #set($userTaskManagerWebHome = $userWikiName + ':Tasks.WebHome') ##* [[image:icon:calendar Gestionnaire de projets>>$userTaskManagerWebHome]] #end * ---- #foreach($group in $groupsForUser) #set($groupId = $group.getId()) #set($groupName = $group.getName()) #set($queryString = 'is_user=false&groupid=' + $groupId) * [[image:icon:group Espace ${escapetool.xml($groupName)}>>xwiki:EESCCode.CSRedirect||queryString="$queryString"]] #end {{/menu}} #end
#* * Display error * ----- * * Display an error when the user is part of no group. *# #macro(displayErrorNoGroup) {{error}}Vous n'êtes inscrit à aucun groupe.{{/error}} #end {{/velocity}}
